hero.title: Chianti, Koramangala: A Taste of Authentic Italy
hero.subtitle: Indulge in classic recipes, handcrafted pasta, and exquisite wines in an atmosphere that transports you straight to the heart of Tuscany.

about.title: Our Story: The Soul of Chianti
about.paragraph1: Born from a deep passion for the rich culinary traditions of Italy, Chianti, Koramangala was established to bring a slice of authentic Tuscan hospitality to Bangalore. Our journey began with a simple mission: to create a warm, inviting space where guests can gather to enjoy classic Italian dishes made with the freshest ingredients and time-honored techniques.
about.paragraph2: From our hand-rolled pastas and slow-cooked sauces to our carefully curated selection of fine wines, every detail is a testament to our love for Italian food. We invite you to join our family at Chianti, Koramangala for an unforgettable dining experience, where every meal is a celebration of flavor, friendship, and la dolce vita.
